data.claim: SuperAGI is a dev-first open-source autonomous AI agent framework with 17.2k GitHub stars (MIT license). Core architecture: FastAPI backend, Next.js frontend, PostgreSQL database, Redis for caching/vectors, Celery workers for background agent execution.
data.snippet: A dev-first open source autonomous AI agent framework enabling developers to build, manage & run useful autonomous agents. FastAPI Backend, PostgreSQL Database, Redis, Celery Worker.
